title: No to Vaccine Passports (with Bob Blackman MP)
itunes:title: No to Vaccine Passports (with Bob Blackman MP)
description:
Bob Blackman, Conservative MP for Harrow East says vaccine passports are impractical and Conservatives should not go back to something they had ruled out. Speaking to Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts, Blackman also says the government must step in and veto the acquisition of Wales' Newport Wafer Fab by a company owned by China's Wingtech.

Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael discusses the 'pingdemic' and the Northern Ireland protocol as the government looks to bolster its position ahead of Parliament's summer recess.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
